text:
The Holt Group is a leading provider of innovative optical solutions, dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology. We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Technical Sales/Optical Engineer to join our team.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
As a Senior Technical Sales/Optical Engineer, you will be responsible for driving sales growth and providing technical expertise to our clients. You will work closely with our cross-functional teams to identify new business opportunities, develop strategic plans, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients to understand their technical requirements and provide tailored solutions
- Collaborate with internal teams to design and implement customized optical systems
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to maintain our competitive edge
- Analyze sales data and market trends to inform business strategies
- Provide technical training and support to clients and internal teams

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Optical Engineering, Physics, or a related field
- Minimum 5 years of experience in technical sales or optical engineering
- Proven track record of driving sales growth and delivering results in fast-paced environments
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and problem-solving skills
- Ability to travel up to 20% of the time

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive health insurance and retirement benefits
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Recognition and reward for outstanding performance

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace, where everyone has the opportunity to thrive. We appreciate the contributions of individuals from all backgrounds and are dedicated to building a team that reflects a variety of viewpoints.
